txt.en: You are now eligible to join a Crafting Guild, a special reputation faction for one of your professions. To join a Crafting Guild, seek out a Master or Mistress of Crafting Guilds.
You are now eligible to join a Crafting Guild, a special reputation faction for one of your professions. To join a Crafting Guild, seek out a Master or Mistress of Crafting Guilds.
